## geospatial analyst | data wrangler | R enthusiast
<hr>

<div class="text">
  Hey there. I'm Andrew, and I'm glad you've found your way to my website! I'm a former Spanish teacher who made a hard pivot to the world of environmental GIS and data analysis, and I haven't looked back since. I am fascinated by all things geospatial, maps, working with data, and birds.
  
  Look around and explore some examples of recent projects I've done. Reach out if you have any questions or want to connect!
